name: part3_fullstack
description: Full Stack open -course by University of Helsinki. Exercises for part 3.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../part3_fullstack/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Hannah Leinson
